title: 30° magazine display font
content:
Hi, I wonder what might be this nice extra black display font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132436im_/http:/typophile.com/files/a0a2e2331f8461e9a07373b6a7f157ab_4095.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132436im_/http:/typophile.com/files/b111f0dc6d1109e0d603adb7a1c22245_3908.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132436im_/http:/typophile.com/files/b991b2bba27800a158b8516ee663a4de_4365.jpg)

Font: 

 Fedra Sans Display Black Condensed 

Solved By:

comments.content: Thanks a lot! I wouldn’t have thought about that!
